Question: In 1995, this person played the role of Ray Zalinsky in Tommy Boy.
Hints: This person also made a surprise SNL guest appearance, along with many SNL alumni, on the evening of March 9, 2013.
This person wrote the liner notes for fellow Ottawa born blues musician JW-Jones' album Bluelisted in 2008.
It starred Demi Moore, Chevy Chase, John Candy and this person sporting an oddly phallic prosthetic nose.
